body_html: An update: Bazel 0.7 has been released, the next version (0.8) will be cut in the beginning of November (probably November 6th) and it will be incompatible with the version of GRPC currently used by Tensorflow. It would be nice to update it before November so that repositories that depend on Tensorflow (for example, TF_serving and TF_models) can be updated too.

body: An update: Bazel 0.7 has been released, the next version (0.8) will be cut in the beginning of November (probably November 6th) and it will be incompatible with the version of GRPC currently used by Tensorflow. It would be nice to update it before November so that repositories that depend on Tensorflow (for example, TF_serving and TF_models) can be updated too.
